products.title: Ombre Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by the ever-changing sky, this ombre roman blind design from clarissa hulse is a beautiful graduation of green blue tones. It starts out light at the top and becomes more and more intense towards the bottom. For the best designs we always give you the best finishing touc inspired by the ever-changing sky, this ombre roman blind design from clarissa hulse is a beautiful graduation of green blue tones.

products.title: Meadow Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Beautiful botanicals in a graduating teal palette inspired by the changing skies and greek countryside, who wouldn't want that hanging at their window? This clarissa hulse design is a bouquet of wild flowers and leaves. Each clematis, quaking grass and wild oat is picked out in r beautiful botanicals in a graduating teal palette inspired by the changing skies and greek countryside, who wouldn't want that hanging at their window? This clarissa hulse design is a bouquet of wild flowers and leaves.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The knightbridge in navy offers a rich, sumptuous blue on the finely woven fabric so typical of its range. The cloth is lightweight and nimble, so it drapes neatly into its roman blind folds, and is lined with polycotton sateen fabric to protect it from colour fade. Add a classical touch to a contemporary living or dining room by blending the navy with white walls and lime green accents. This unique colour combination will provide a fantastic vivacity to the room and, accentuated with glossy silver metallics, will combine the modern with the traditional beautifully.

products.title: Flamingos, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: The bright and refreshing light blue of the flamingos in aqua is perfect for brightening up any home. Sweet flamingos, gently drawn in ice whites and candy pinks, skim the water and add colour to this delightful blind. The most obvious place for this water-themed roman blind would be in the bathroom, where it will look stunning against bright white tiles and blue accessories, but a fun alternative might be the guest bedroom, where you can accessorise with varying shades of sky blue and the occasional soft pink too.

products.title: Sicily, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Silky, royal blue thread, gently speckled with gold, makes a gorgeously regal base for the sicily blue, which is otherwise adorned with its traditional diamond patterning in gold and sweet pops of petrol blue. Design a traditional and moody bathroom look by hanging the blue amongst white victorian tiling, matching blue walls, and a roll-top, claw-foot bath. Opt for classic gold taps and fittings, ensuring that you still have all of your mod-cons, and bedeck the room in luxurious gold frames and oddments.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Turquoise Roman Blind
products.description: Woven through with deep sumptuous blue green colour, this ahisma luxe faux silk turquoise roman blind has all the beautiful silken features you would expect including a natural slubby texture and discrete lustre. Looking fabulous at the window, this blind will coordinate effor woven through with deep sumptuous blue green colour, this ahisma luxe faux silk turquoise roman blind has all the beautiful silken features you would expect including a natural slubby texture and discrete lustre.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Blue Azure Roman Blind
products.description: The ahisma luxe faux silk blue azure roman blind is at the height of its game with a beautiful shade and luxurious texture. The way it twinkles in the light is just magical too. The deluxe perfect raise headrail that comes as standard with this blind adds to the elegance furt the ahisma luxe faux silk blue azure roman blind is at the height of its game with a beautiful shade and luxurious texture.

products.title: Encanto Shimmering Blue Roman Blind
products.description: With its blue colouring and metallic shimmering yarn flowing through their encanto shimmering blue roman blind will be a magnificent showcase in your home. The dark, warm blue sits beautifully next to the white, shimmering threads creating a glamorous design, while the linen e with its blue colouring and metallic shimmering yarn flowing through their encanto shimmering blue roman blind will be a magnificent showcase in your home.

products.title: Como, Grape - Roman Blind
products.description: Muted grape purple and softened charcoal grey make the perfect colour combination for this roman blind from the como range, and sit prettily against the soft cream background. The watercolour look of these gorgeous blossoms only add to the delicate look of the piece. Give your living room a purple-toned makeover by going all out and hanging the grape against a matching purple feature wall. The look will be striking and unmissable, yet tempered by the fragility of the florals and the gentle tone of the cream background.

products.title: Como, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous cornflower blue gives this pretty roman blind from the como range its completely apt name. The rich cream background and grey-taupe foliage offset the delicate blue shade perfectly, giving the blind a soft yet refreshing look. The cornflower would be right at home in the bathroom, against white, cream, or pale aqua walls, a white bathroom suite, and white or patterned tiling. Make this shade of blue your colour of choice when it comes to towels and accessories for a prettily coordinated feel.

products.title: Como, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The monochrome look of the como in grey gives this pretty range of roman blinds a whole new dimension. The off-white background provides the perfect base for the soft charcoal of the floral imagery, with the delicate watercolour look standing out beautifully. If monochrome is your thing, add the grey to a pale grey or deep charcoal wall to provide light relief, keeping all furniture, soft furnishings, and ornaments to black, grey, and white shades.

products.title: Como, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the como in ochre offers pretty blossoms in ochre, mustard, and lemon yellows, accompanied by foliage in a soft mid-grey tone. The cream background provides an attractive contrast and the look is one of sunny cheer. Yellow and grey makes an ideal colour combination for a calming office or home study, so settle the ochre against a palest grey walls, opting for contemporary furniture with clean, straight lines.

products.title: Narvik, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: There are shades of blue, and then there is muted sky blue, with its understated richness and dreamy toning. Enter narvik blue, a gorgeously woven cotton fabric featuring a stunningly natural sky blue tone adorned with off-white birds, florals, and foliage. This simple yet effective design will add some cutesy yet contemporary flavour to any home. Hang the blue in a fresh and vibrant living room, against soft white walls and with varying shades of blue throughout.

products.title: Aquataine, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: Fusing vintage tones of taupe and pink, the aquataine rose has a gorgeously romantic aesthetic, full of charm and prettiness all the way through. The blooming florals sit sweetly on this soft linen, which gathers neatly into the roman's pleats. Opt for an untraditional colour scheme in the dining room, using the pink and brown from the blind as your key colours. Choose creamy white walls, then match dark furniture to the brown and sumptuous fabrics and accessories to the pink.

products.title: Maurice, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorn your windows in voluptuous cloth with the maurice in teal, a gorgeous roman blind made from a fine, downy thread to form a plentiful blind with a receptive and comforting touch. Its rich and alluring, modern colour gives a stylish and welcoming feel. For everlasting, modern style, mix the vibrant teal with luscious back notes of chocolate brown and creamy caramel, adding distinctive colour with alike, azure-toned floral prints and soft furnishings for a themed colour scheme with added cosiness and charisma.

products.title: Seaside Huts Blue Roman Blind
products.description: The seaside huts is a wonderful blind range with the cute pattern of little houses. Being at the seaside is fantastic. It is even better to bring the feeling of being at the seaside to your home with this multicoloured roller blind. Product id: db-arom0841 fabric colour: blue material: 100% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes seaside huts blue roman blind in blue/multicoloured.

products.title: Starry Skies Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Twinkle, twinkle little and big stars how much of a galaxys-worth will your youngsters count on this blue and cream emma bridgewater starry skies roman blind as they journey from their childrens bedroom to the land of nod? products.title: Nuevo Sapphire Roman Blind
products.description: Bold interlocking shapes make up this patchwork design from scion, creating a cool and contemporary roman blind that would make any living room or bedroom a stylish haven. The nuevo sapphire roman blind enjoys a striking palette of bright tangerine, sophisticated indigo and bol bold interlocking shapes make up this patchwork design from scion, creating a cool and contemporary roman blind that would make any living room or bedroom a stylish haven.

products.title: Starry Skies Multi Blues Roman Blind
products.description: With emma bridgewater's signature watercolour look, this starry skies multi blues roman blind is the perfect combination of country charm and childhood dreams. With a palette of sweet blues and greens upon the softness of cream, this design works wonders in pastel schemes. Or ev with emma bridgewater's signature watercolour look, this starry skies multi blues roman blind is the perfect combination of country charm and childhood dreams.

products.title: Nectar Denim Roman Blind
products.description: Sanderson excel at creating designs that celebrate the very best of british wildlife and this nectar denim roman blind is no different. Just as the name suggests, this design celebrates one of nature's hardest workers. The charming bumble bees are arranged into a honeycomb trell sanderson excel at creating designs that celebrate the very best of british wildlife and this nectar denim roman blind is no different.

products.title: Swallows And Swifts Blue Roman Blind
products.description: These birds may flit and flutter but theyll never fly away. Instead, theyll continue swooping all over this blue and cream emma bridgewater swallows and swifts roman blind in your kitchen or utility room.

products.title: Rosehip Leaf Blue Roman Blind
products.description: When emma bridgewater started out, she filled endless sketchbooks with notes and drawings such as of hawthorns, sloes and rosehips. Well, weve taken a leaf from her book with this rosehip leaf blue roman blind for your bedroom in gentle blue against cream.

products.title: Eden Denim Roman Blind
products.description: As subtle a stripe as you ever will see with a colour palette to match. Sanderson know stripes and this eden denim roman blind is aptly named, its utterly serene. The combination of blues, greys and whites is barely more than a whisper but it brings a relaxing vibe to the w as subtle a stripe as you ever will see with a colour palette to match.

products.title: Booby Bird Sapphire Roman Blind
products.description: Scion have really done their bit at bringing unusual animals to the hearts and minds of us all and this booby bird sapphire roman blind is just utterly adorable. Known for their bright blue feet, these lovely little chicks are bound to capture your heart as much as they have scion have really done their bit at bringing unusual animals to the hearts and minds of us all and this booby bird sapphire roman blind is just utterly adorable.

products.title: Dawn Chorus Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: This dawn chorus mineral blue roman blind appeals to both young and old, with pale blue birds balancing on the branches of an ever-growing neutral tree. The romantic nature of the design makes it an excellent choice to carry a room all the way from a nursery for a new born to this dawn chorus mineral blue roman blind appeals to both young and old, with pale blue birds balancing on the branches of an ever-growing neutral tree.

products.title: Yoki Sapphire Roman Blind
products.description: Set the scene right with the beautifully cool yoki sapphire roman blind creating a fresh and funky setting within your home and bringing superior style. With smooth materials and polished oaks accessorizing this blind, the theme really starts to come together, with a look that set the scene right with the beautifully cool yoki sapphire roman blind creating a fresh and funky setting within your home and bringing superior style.

products.title: Vw Campervan, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're a free spirit at heart, then you'll love the vw campervan blue. A creamy beige fabric, made from 100% cotton, is home to an array of these cute vehicles depicted from a variety of angles. Blue is the main colour here, alongside other accents, and the effect is sweet and charming. Go for a fun and inviting look in your guest bedroom by including the blue. Keep the room looking light and airy with whites, beiges, and other neutrals, throwing in the occasional blue or red for character.

products.title: William Morris Compton China Blue Roman Blind
products.description: A striking design from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, compton was originally produced in 1896 for compton hall, the house of laurence w. Hodson, a patron of the arts. products.title: Grove, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with pretty blue florals and foliage, the grove in saxon blue combines its title colour with gentle pinks and greens for a summery look that you'll love all year round. Its 100% cotton fabric ensures you a high quality, touchable material that's easy to use. Add the saxon blue to your hallway for a colourful welcome to your home. Keep the walls cream or palest blue, and accent throughout with naturally toned blues and pinks.

products.title: Aquataine, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring must-have shade of aqua, the charming aquitaine eau de nil hosts a sprightly background of duck egg blue, adorned with a creative and appealing botanic illustration. The artistically sketched florals in contemporary white and subdued grey gives the blind delicate detail for a unique and elegant style. Incorporate the delightful eau de nil within a calm and soothing palette of sky blues and whites to create a coordinating and fresh background in your dining room.

products.title: Acanthus, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: In vintage retro style, the acanthus navy features large, ordered florals in deep navy, midnight blue, and golden camel, with various patterns and plain colourings. The overall effect is one of bold sophistication and contemporary traditionalism. Make the navy your dining room's focal point by anchoring it against white walls and complementing with light to medium woods and taupe and blue fabrics, cushions, and crockery.

products.title: Aquataine, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The aquataine charcoal is a sophisticated affair, mingling classic florals with slate and dove greys on a soft white canvas. This blind is a classy and stylish one, and you'll find that it adds a modish edge to any room it's placed in. Place a romantic take on monochrome, using the charcoal in a contemporary living room amongst a range of linens, wools, and voiles in greys, blacks, and whites. Choose ornaments and accessories in brushed silver or modern pewter to complement the scheme.

products.title: Button Spot Blue Roman Blind
products.description: An iconic design by the fabulous cath kidston, button spot blue is a much-loved and popular print. Hand-drawn polka-dots pop against the soft blue fabric and theyre all slightly different, giving the design an extra charming detail. With its traditional style, this roman bl an iconic design by the fabulous cath kidston, button spot blue is a much-loved and popular print.

products.title: Birds And Roses Blue Roman Blind
products.description: A dreamy combination of cath kidstons most loved design motifs, the birds and roses print features a delicate array of trailing flowers, with sweet birds and butterflies nested in between the leaves. The soft blue is beautifully serene, bringing tranquillity and the beauty a dreamy combination of cath kidstons most loved design motifs, the birds and roses print features a delicate array of trailing flowers, with sweet birds and butterflies nested in between the leaves.

products.title: Liliana Navy Roman Blind
products.description: This dark blue tone has a warm and cosy feel and with the fabrics inky finish theres a scoop of drama too. The liliana navy blind with all its character looks stunning at the window and when the light catches it theres a gorgeous comforting looks just like the cosiest of bl this dark blue tone has a warm and cosy feel and with the fabrics inky finish theres a scoop of drama too.

products.title: Phoebe, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: Blues are the stars of the show in the phoebe aqua, but they're not on their own. Cobalt, sky, and aqua blues are mixed with fun shades of apple green, lemon yellow, and coral orange, resulting in a fun and eclectic look sure to liven up any living space. Add the aqua to a room in need of some inspiration, such as a plain utility room or hallway, or a creative space such as an art studio or playroom.

The modern, vibrant flavour of this roman blind is certain to add a pop of colour to you what says summer better than beautiful flowering botanicals.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides. The result is an elegant, feathery print of swaying grasses that will add beauty and charm to your home. This blind is picked out in contrastin each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides.

products.title: Bali Azure Roman Blind
products.description: Just like a warm summer's day, this bali azure roman blind is energetic, buzzing with colour and stylish flare. We simply adore the way that the bold fiery orange offsets the tonal blues, bringing warmth the a cool palette. Well done harlequin.
